bioconda.name: dsk
bioconda.summary: DSK is a k-mer counter for reads or genomes.

biocontainers.name: dsk
biocontainers.summary: DSK is a k-mer counter for reads or genomes.

biotools.summary: K-mer counting software, similar to Jellyfish. Jellyfish is very fast but limited to large-memory servers and k 32. This software supports large values of k, and runs with (almost-)arbitrarily low memory usage and reasonably low temporary disk usage. It can count k-mers of large Illumina datasets on laptops and desktop computers.
